R

rand - Variable in class ChatBot
Random which is used to generate random numbers to pick the bot response's randomly from the list of responses.
rand - Static variable in class DoDUtility
Random which is used to generate random numbers
randomMove(ArrayList<String>) - Method in class BotPlayer
Picks a random move from the list of valid neighbours the bot has and returns it
randomReply(ArrayList<String>) - Method in class ChatBot
Picks a random String from a given list of Strings
readLoop() - Method in class ClientRead
Keeps reading the data received from the server, and displaying it to the user This only stops if an IOException is thrown (if the server is forcibly closed) or if the serverResponse is null, which occurs if the server closed peacefully.
removeClient(int) - Method in class ChatServer
This method removes a client from the server cleanly given the client's ID.
removeClientFromDoD(int) - Method in class ChatServer
This method ends a client's DoD game in the DoDClient given the client's ID.
removeClientFromServer() - Method in class ServerClientHandler
 
run() - Method in class ClientRead
Implementation of the abstract run method which is how the ClientRead should run.
run() - Method in class ClientWrite
Implementation of the abstract run method which is how the ClientWrite should run.
run() - Method in class ServerClientHandler
Implementation of the abstract run method which is how the ServerClientHandler should run.
run() - Method in class ServerUserInput
Implementation of the abstract run method which is how the ServerUserInput should run.
runMethod(List<String>) - Method in class Command
Runs the method using the arguments passed
